title: River Cottage: Fruit Every Day!
description: 'Fruit is the best, most bountiful and bounciest food we have, and eating more of it can bring us nothing but pleasure and good health. I've written this book not to tell you why - I think that's obvious - but to show you how.' Includes many inventive fruit-including recipes - from pizzas to roasts to ice cream - divided by fruit type: Summer berries & currants, Rhubarb, Stone fruit, Apples, Pears & Quinces, Hedgerow fruit, Figs, Melons, Grapes & more, Tropical favourites, Citrus Fruit, Dried fruit, Uncommon fruits.
author: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall
